title: Reigning Esports LF > Coach, Manager, Support, Jungle
body:
Hey Guys,

We are currently looking:
Support / Jungle

That can commit to practice and scrims on a 3-5 days a week basis

Requirements:

- Must have a mic and be actively vocal
- Diamond+ In Solo Que
- Dedicated to becoming a better player and with the team

Add me in game or comment here in the format:

Ign:
Role:
Soloque Rank 2016:

Hope to hear from you guys :)

Rainin-

replies.body:
Ign: I Am Pretty Bad
Role: Support
Soloque Rank 2016: Ended season on Smurf in Plat 

Last 2 seasons I've been to busy to even think about solo climbing back into diamond, Support main and I love playing it.
Very skillful been playing since season 2, Recently gave my main away to level smurf

IGN: Galladrim
Role: Support
Soloque Rank 2016: Diamond III 

Haven't played on a team in some time, would like to get back into it.

Ign: ExplodingTNT
Role: Jungle
Soloque Rank 2016: Ended in plat 4 but climbed to plat 1 promos then droped to plat 2 75 lp was just wondering if i can still qualify for the team
